courses.title: English Basics
courses.description: Learn essential English phrases and greetings.

topics.title: Hello and Goodbye
topics.content: Learn how to greet someone and say farewell.

topics.title: Introducing Yourself
topics.content: How to introduce yourself in English.

topics.title: Family Members
topics.content: Learn names of family members like father, mother, uncle, and aunt.

topics.title: Talking About Family
topics.content: How to describe your family in English.

topics.title: Family Members

topics.content: How to describe your family in Spanish.
